meanings.sent1: I received a telegram from my friend inviting me to a party.
meanings.sent2: Back in the old days, people used to send important news through telegrams.
meanings.sent3: The telegram from my grandma made me smile with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes lit up as if she had received a telegram full of good news.
meanings.sent5: The telegram arrived with such urgency that I knew it carried important information.

meanings.definition: To send a message by telegraph
meanings.sent1: I will telegram you the details of the meeting tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: In the past, people would telegram urgent messages to each other.
meanings.sent3: I decided to telegram my friend a funny joke to brighten their day.
meanings.sent4: Her words telegrammed a sense of urgency that made me act quickly.
meanings.sent5: The way he telegrammed his emotions through the wire was truly touching.
